message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for sale. I think you'll find it very useful. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $180 is already a discount on what I was hoping to get. Could you meet me halfway at $150?
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $130, but that's as low as I can go.
